title: Toro V
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Marks LRC, in pencil: [M.G. Erickson \'84]; LLC, in penci
description: evening/nighttime scene of gold carved lantern atop a pedestal at LR; at L, a portion of a temple building (housing a gold bell?) on a stone foundation; low wall in background with towering, shadow-like foliage behind
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
